name: FENOFIBRATE
cautions:
Cautions see under Bezafibrate; liver function tests recommended every 3 months for first year (discontinue
treatment if significantly raised)
side-effects: Side-effects see under Bezafibrate; also very rarely hepatitis, pancreatitis, and interstitial pneumopathies
doses:
initially 3 capsules daily in divided doses; usual range
2–4 capsules daily; child 4–15 years
1 capsule/20 kg daily

initially 1 capsule daily (dose form not appropriate for
children or in renal impairment)

severe hyperlipidaemia, 1 capsule daily (dose form not
appropriate for children or in renal impairment)
pregnancy: Pregnancy manufacturers advise avoid—embryotoxicity in animal studies
